trans-unit.source: The following table describes each of the major quotas, limits, defaults, and throttles in Azure Scheduler.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes each of the major quotas, limits, defaults, and throttles in Azure Scheduler.

trans-unit.source: If a PUT or a PATCH results in a job larger than these limits, a 400 Bad Request status code is returned.
trans-unit.target: If a PUT or a PATCH results in a job larger than these limits, a 400 Bad Request status code is returned.

trans-unit.source: Maximum size of the request URL is 2048 chars.
trans-unit.target: Maximum size of the request URL is 2048 chars.

trans-unit.source: Maximum aggregate header size is 4096 chars.
trans-unit.target: Maximum aggregate header size is 4096 chars.

trans-unit.source: Maximum “time to start time” is 18 months.
trans-unit.target: Maximum “time to start time” is 18 months.

trans-unit.source: Maximum response body stored in job history is 2048 bytes.
trans-unit.target: Maximum response body stored in job history is 2048 bytes.

trans-unit.source: The default max frequency quota is 1 hour in a free job collection and 1 minute in a standard job collection.
trans-unit.target: The default max frequency quota is 1 hour in a free job collection and 1 minute in a standard job collection.

trans-unit.source: The max frequency is configurable on a job collection to be lower than the maximum.
trans-unit.target: The max frequency is configurable on a job collection to be lower than the maximum.

trans-unit.source: All jobs in the job collection are limited the value set on the job collection.
trans-unit.target: All jobs in the job collection are limited the value set on the job collection.

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to create a job with a higher frequency than the maximum frequency on the job collection then request will fail with a 409 Conflict status code.
trans-unit.target: If you attempt to create a job with a higher frequency than the maximum frequency on the job collection then request will fail with a 409 Conflict status code.

trans-unit.source: The default max jobs quota is 5 jobs in a free job collection and 50 jobs in a standard job collection.
trans-unit.target: The default max jobs quota is 5 jobs in a free job collection and 50 jobs in a standard job collection.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of jobs is configurable on a job collection.
trans-unit.target: The maximum number of jobs is configurable on a job collection.

trans-unit.source: All jobs in the job collection are limited the value set on the job collection.
trans-unit.target: All jobs in the job collection are limited the value set on the job collection.

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to create more jobs than the maximum jobs quota, then the request fails with a 409 Conflict status code.
trans-unit.target: If you attempt to create more jobs than the maximum jobs quota, then the request fails with a 409 Conflict status code.

trans-unit.source: Job history is retained for up to 2 months.
trans-unit.target: Job history is retained for up to 2 months.

trans-unit.source: Completed and faulted jobs are retailed for 60 days.
trans-unit.target: Completed and faulted jobs are retailed for 60 days.

trans-unit.source: There’s a static (not configurable) request timeout of 30 seconds for HTTP actions.
trans-unit.target: There’s a static (not configurable) request timeout of 30 seconds for HTTP actions.

trans-unit.source: For longer running operations, follow HTTP asynchronous protocols; for example, return a 202 immediately but continue working in the background.
trans-unit.target: For longer running operations, follow HTTP asynchronous protocols; for example, return a 202 immediately but continue working in the background.
